name: Ziggy: ZigZag Boom Game
description:
Tap to Zigzag your way through color switching evil cubes and spikes while collecting as much coins as possible to unlock achievements. Make your way through the challenging valley of different geometrical shapes and spikes.

Don't hit spikes or the cubes in your way. Tap faster while Zigzagging and choose you angles wisely. Different colors that are beautiful and soothing to the eyes. A new type of Zigzag game with totally unique game mechanics and gameplay.

Features:

  • •Zigzag Boom Effects
  • •Color switching obstacles
  • •Eye soothing graphics
  • •Beautiful particle effects
  • •Fast paced game
  • •Rewards
  • •Leaderboard
  • •Achievements
  • •Social Sharing
  • •Endless & Extreme ZigZagging
  • •Challenging yet beautiful obstacles
  • •Stunning sound effects
  • •High Quality Game
  • •Smooth Gameplay & Animations
  • •Most Addictive Zigzag Game Ever
  • •Spikes and cubes in walls
  • •Compete with friends & other gamers globally
  • •Extreme Difficulty Level
  • •More Games feature
  • •Fully Optimized

In the game of ZigZagging you either Win Big or you Die!

Share your scores with you friends across all social media instantly and compete with them not just in the game but on social medias too. Do you have what it takes to be an extreme ZigZagger? Show us by skipping as much cubes as possible…
